clientFromIntegrationWarn: This client is a part of an integration.

select.label: Select a pricing model
select.description: Select it from the dropdown, if no model match your client, you can create a new one

details.title: {{pricingModelName}} details
details.forBothVerifiedAndUnverified: For both verified and unverified deals

fallBackToDefaultPricing.isDisabled: Fall back to default pricing model : Disabled
fallBackToDefaultPricing.isEnabled: Fall back to default pricing model : Enabled
fallBackToDefaultPricing.notApplicable: Fall back to default pricing model : Not applicable

error.isClientNotExistingOrNotAllowed: The client you ask doesn't exist or you are not allowed to perform this operation

validation.isGenericErrorWhileAddingClient: Something wrong while adding the client
validation.isPricingModelSelectionMandatory: You must select the rules model to be associated with this new client!
validation.isAddressOrPeerIdFieldMandatory: You must select at least one address or Peer ID for this client!
validation.isClientNameAlreadyUsed: Client name is already used, it must be unique for all your clients!

error.isAddressCantBeAddedOneMoreTime: {{address}} cannot be added more than one time
error.isAddressResolvesToAlreadyUsed: {{address}} resolves to {{resolvedAddress}} and is already in the client address list
error.isAddressBlacklisted: {{address}} is blacklisted, whitelist it before associating it to a client
error.isAddressGenericError: {{address}} cannot be added, please try later or contact CIDgravity
error.isAddressInvalidFilecoinFormat: {{address}} is not a valid Filecoin address
error.isAddressInvalidFormat: {{address}} address type is not supported, use SECP256K1, ID or BLS address
error.isPeerIdAlreadyAdded: {{peerId}} cannot be added more than one time
error.isPeerIdInvalidFormat: {{peerId}} is not a valid Peer ID
